SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT14
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent by the system to notify the user that it has aborted both the GPA session belonging to the LT identified in the Basic Header, and the open FIN session controlled by the aborted GPA. The FIN interface is requested to do likewise and is not expected to confirm termination of the GPA and the associated applications.
From: GPA To: User

SystemField.Name: system-abort-code
SystemField.description: Reason for system abort. See the SWIFTNet FIN Error Codes module for the full set of abort codes.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: system-abort-code
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Reason for system abort. See the FIN Error Codes for the full set of abort codes
